body_html:
Sounds like Google trying us all for something however bazel it is good platform as you say would be shame to change it 

On Wed, 9 Dec, 2015 at 1:24 AM, Angry Lionnotifications@github.com wrote:
not sure why we even have to deal with bazel in the first place, when cmake is already a great platform independent build tool. is this just Google trying to get us to beta test its new toy Bazel?

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
